text:
Armen Vardani Sarkissian (; born 23 June 1952) is an Armenian politician currently the incumbent President of Armenia. He served as Prime Minister of Armenia from 4 November 1996 to 20 March 1997 andwas the country's (longest-serving) ambassador in London since 1998.
Sarkissian became President of Armenia on 9 April 2018.
